abstract: The Texas governor also announced that he would offer a detailed plan for job creation next week in the first policy speech of his presidential candidacy.
snippet: The Texas governor also announced that he would offer a detailed plan for job creation next week in the first policy speech of his presidential candidacy.
lead_paragraph: ORANGE CITY, Iowa - Gov. Rick Perry of Texas said Saturday that he would offer a detailed plan for job creation next week in the first policy speech of his presidential candidacy. But during a weekend visit here, he spent much of the time focusing on another issue: immigration.

headline.main: Perry, in Iowa, Focuses on Immigration
